'''Mefisto''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Mefisto is a special kind of construct bought by [Gyntel](/gyntel/) to pleasure his customers.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * Mefisto says "Assume the position"
}}

## Behind the scenes

* Mefisto is a reference to the infamous breaker of hearts and bums, [https://fallout.gamepedia.com/Fisto FISTO], from ''Fallout: New Vegas''.
[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)
